import React from 'react' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import ExerciseList from './components/ExerciseList' import PlanList from './components/PlanList' import {useCookies} from 'react-cookie'; import {BrowserRouter, Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom' import Login from './components/Login' import {CookiesProvider} from 'react-cookie' import TrainingPlan from './components/TrainingPlan' import LogOut from './components/LogOut' import './App.css'; import { Layout } from './components/Layout' import {NavigationBar } from './components/Navbar' import FinishedList from './components/FinishedList'; import GenerateForm from './components/GenerateForm'; // import {ScrollRestoration,RestoredScroll} from 'react-scroll-restoration' function App() { const [exercises, setExercises] = useState([]) const [token] = useCookies(['mytoken']) useEffect(() => { fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/exercise-list', { 'method':'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type':'application/json', } }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(resp => setExercises(resp)) }, [token]) return ( {/* */}

Homepage


{/* */}
) } export default App;
